name: Paper Aliens
description:
Hello guys,

this is my first game, so I hope you enjoy it.

So if you have any issues with the game just tell me. If you don't know how to play just look under help.

You are a Spaceship that has to shoot at other aliens. Over time the game gets harder, because the aliens level up. The start dodging your bullets and shooting them. You get different bullets to defend yourself from them. A normal bullet that kills the enemies, a slow bullet and a stun bullet.
